data.title: Gerald R. Ford Presidential Library and Museum
data.text:
Gerald R. Ford and Betty B. Ford Burial Site Information

The Gerald R. Ford and Betty B. Ford Burial Site is on the grounds of the Gerald R. Ford Presidential Museum at 303 Pearl Street NW, Grand Rapids, MI 49504-5353.

The Burial Site is open to the public every day (except Thanksgiving, Christmas Day and New Year's Day) from 9 am to 5 pm.

Parking is free. For more information, please call (616) 254-0400.

Former U.S. Attorney General

Alberto R. Gonzales at the Burial Site on August 15, 2007

Sons of the American Revolution

Wreath Laying Ceremony on

November 2, 2007
